description: This file is the entry point for a React application, setting up the React rendering root and rendering the main router component inside a StrictMode wrapper.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root API container for React 18+ to manage rendering.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A wrapper component used to activate additional checks and warnings for descendant components.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Method to render React elements into the container.
